description: Identifier of the saved query/report this sharing rule references.
Sequence number of this sharing entry for the query, supporting ordering or uniqueness among multiple recipients.
Recipient identifier the query is shared with (likely a user, role, or workgroup code; confirm with SME). Ignored when share_type is Everyone.
Permission granted to the recipient for the query (e.g., read-only 'R'; other codes may indicate edit or manage rightsâ€”likely; confirm with SME).
Type/scope of sharing, such as individual user, workgroup, or everyone, which dictates how share_with is interpreted.
User account that created/recorded this sharing entry.
Date and time when this sharing entry was created.
User account that last updated this sharing entry.
Date and time of the most recent update to this sharing entry.
